DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) , dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) , safety profile TKI258 administer subject acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics TKI258 Subjects With Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis Acute Myeloid Leukemia Eighteen year age old Life expectancy least 2 month Intracranial disease epidural disease Clinically significant cardiac disease Diabetes mellitus uncontrolled medication Pregnant breast feed woman Dementia alter mental status Known preexist clinically significant uncontrolled disorder hypothalamicpituitary axis , adrenal thyroid glands Previous pericarditis Malabsorption syndrome uncontrolled gastrointestinal symptom nausea , diarrhea , vomit
